page-programs-filter-error: No programs with all your chosen filters (yet).
page-programs-try-removing-filters: Try removing a filter or two, or add to our repository!
page-programs-submit-description: To submit a program, you'll need to use GitHub. We welcome you to create an issue or a pull request to submit articles or links to external programs.
page-programs-new-github-description: Raise an issue â€“ simply fill in the requested information in the form and paste your program details.
page-programs-pull-request-description: Please make changes on your local version and follow the naming structure for submission.
page-programs-profile-1-description: I can't seem to concentrate on the things I need to do.
page-programs-profile-2-description: I don't understand why others can't just see it my way.
page-programs-profile-3-description: I lack confidence in myself and my capability.
page-programs-profile-4-description: I fall short of being able to achieve what I want to do.
page-tutorials-env-banner: Don't commit .env! Please make sure never to share or expose your .env file with anyone, as you are compromising your secrets in doing so. If you are using version control, add your .env to a gitignore file.
